|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT8163V;MediaTek, ARM, MT8163V, 1636-KBCAH, CCMKYRHS; <!-- 1642-KBCTH, CCMK04TW; --> |cpu1_cores = 4<!-- (ARM Cortex-A53 64-bit 4x @1.5GHz) --> |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit <!--|cpu2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7688AN; |cpu2spd = -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29TZZZ4D4BKERL-125:W ;6PA98 JWB30; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> <!--|flash1size = 4 GiB |fla1chip = Samsung;KMFJ20005A-B213; SEC 643 B213 KMF J20005A; |flash2size = 32 |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q256FVEG; -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT29TZZZ4D4BKERL-125:W; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> <!--|ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;KMFJ20005A-B213; |ram2size = 128 |ram2chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16HG-ACI; --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
